items.value: Reduces the amount of time squished by 20% of the original time.

Increases the value of the sticker to the right by two.
Can be chained with other Boost Next stickers.
Currently boosting: {0}.
This sticker will transform into a random sticker when applied.
Adds an 8% chance that a used item will remain in the inventory.

Reduces the size of the map by 7%. Must be applied before exploring
a level for the first time in a run to take effect.
Cannot be removed if the current level has already been generated.

Adds an extra locked room to the level. Must be applied before exploring
a level for the first time in a run to take effect.
Cannot be removed if the current level has already been generated.
Every time YTPs are earned, 1 second of invisibility is given for each 15 YTPs.

Adds 3 vents to the level. Must be applied before exploring
a level for the first time in a run to take effect.
Cannot be removed if the current level has already been generated.
